name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\nIf the character has at least 2 $[K310], this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\nIf the character has at least 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext:
"...Losing one's memory is no different from losing one's life. It is like death amidst darkness eternal."
"Life is full of uncertainty. Love is fleeting, and even lasting memories may be lost..."
